value:
Father... I will keep both Mother and
Pherae safe from harm. You can rest
now and be at peace...

Ceremonies mark both endings and
beginnings—that gives them value,
but...I prefer those with less...pomp.

Ah, I beg your pardon. I'm not quite
used to this outfit, so it's difficult to
move with any grace...

I must make sure my etiquette is well
polished for future diplomacy. Do you
think I've improved enough yet?

Nerves before a ceremony and those
before battle are two different things.
One more thing I must get used to...

I am Eliwood, Marquess of Pherae.
I have come with greetings sent on
behalf of $Nf.

My greatest wish is to carry on my
Father's will.

I will need to work harder if I'm to be
worthy of donning such a splendid
outfit as this.
Did I...get ahead of myself?

My thanks. Now I will perform for you
in a way befitting my station!

Are you...? No, of course not...
I am Eliwood, Marquess of Pherae.
I'm new to this, but I learn quickly.

I've had some time to think since
arriving here, and I keep coming back
to this: Why me, of all people?$k$pThe answer has eluded me so far, but
perhaps the gods have seen fit to
grant me some sort of respite here.$k$pI've learned much in my time here.
Being surrounded by Heroes has
revealed how far I have yet to go...$k$pBut the voices that called me here,
those who called to me with support
and praise... I owe them a debt.$k$pThose voices filled me with a resolve
I've not known previously. I have a
duty to live up to their expectations.$k$pEven so, resolve alone is not enough.
So I humbly request you allow me to
continue leaning on your support.
Tah!
It's decided!
Oof...
There...?!
I am Marquess of Pherae!
I will protect everyone!
Watch over me, Father...
For Pherae!
How disappointing...
Phew...
Everything has finally been settled. I am to succeed my father as Marquess Pherae.
What? These clothes? I look silly, don't I...
Formal dress is so stiff, I can hardly stand it...
Thank you for your stalwart support.
Will you attend my ascension ceremony?
If it weren't for you, I wouldn't... This world wouldn't be here.
You have my heartfelt gratitude, and my support—whenever you need it. That's a promise, my friend.
Sure thing.
Careful now...
At your command.
